Items.name: Chicken Fried Rice
Items.discription: A flavorful mix of long-grain rice stir-fried with tender chicken, fresh vegetables, soy sauce, and aromatic spices. Perfectly balanced for a satisfying and savory Asian-style meal everyone will enjoy.

Items.name: Chinese Pasta
Items.discription: Fusion-style pasta tossed in a bold and spicy Chinese sauce, featuring garlic, chili, and crisp vegetables. A unique and delicious twist on traditional noodles that brings East and West together.

Items.name: Chicken Pizza
Items.discription: A classic pizza loaded with grilled chicken, melted mozzarella cheese, tangy tomato sauce, and Italian herbs. This crispy crust pizza is a perfect combination of comfort, flavor, and satisfaction.

Items.name: Chicken Noodles
Items.discription: Savory noodles stir-fried with marinated chicken, bell peppers, onions, and a flavorful blend of Asian sauces. A hearty and satisfying dish packed with bold, mouthwatering flavor and texture.

Items.name: Grilled Chicken
Items.discription: Tender chicken breast grilled to perfection and seasoned with a smoky spice blend. Served juicy and hot, this high-protein option is both healthy and delicious for any meal of the day.

Items.name: Apricot Chicken
Items.discription: Succulent chicken pieces cooked in a sweet and tangy apricot glaze, creating a rich and flavorful dish. The perfect balance of fruitiness and savory spices makes it a unique experience.

Items.name: Chicken Burger
Items.discription: A juicy grilled chicken patty nestled in a toasted bun with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and creamy mayo. This satisfying burger is packed with flavor, crunch, and a touch of spice.

Items.name: Bacon Burger
Items.discription: Stacked high with crispy bacon, melted cheese, and a beef patty, this burger delivers a rich and smoky taste in every bite. Served on a fluffy bun with signature sauce.

Items.name: Cheese Butter
Items.discription: A decadent dish made with rich butter, melted cheese, herbs, and spices. Smooth, creamy, and savoryâ€”this comforting recipe is perfect for dipping, topping, or enjoying as a side treat.

Items.name: Italiano Original
Items.discription: Crafted with authentic Italian flavors, this dish blends herbs, tomato, garlic, and olive oil for a truly rustic experience. A flavorful journey to Italy on your plate with every bite.
